item.title: The Murdoverse
item.description:
<![CDATA[
The Murdoverse is the expanding constellation of Murdochian projects — every creation bearing the “Murdoch” moniker.
Here you will find experiments in language, open-source tools, lexicographic endeavors, digital worlds, and conceptual frameworks that orbit the Moribund Institute.
Each project contributes to a larger aim: accelerating the velocity of ideas.]]>

item.title: About
item.description:
<![CDATA[
Hello I am ‘MoribundMurdoch’ i.e. a Murdoch whoo happens to be “moribund’ or in ’the process of dying’ I’m a lexicographer and your friendly neighborhood hypochondriac, serving up his visionary idiocy with unwavering commitment.]]>
